summary: REQ-4 (frontend emergency reset UI prompting for a code, requiring non-empty input, submitting to backend, and showing clear English success/error messaging including invalid-code messaging) appears implemented via EmergencyOwnershipResetCard and related hook handling. REQ-3 (backend exact-match authorization code 73024141 enforced in emergencyResetOwnership with trap on mismatch) is not verifiable from the provided backend diff excerpt because emergencyResetOwnership and the reset code check are not shown. REQ-2 (publish/deploy to resolve draft-expired) cannot be verified from code diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish the latest application changes by rebuilding and deploying the current version so end users can access them (resolving the prior "draft app expired" publish issue).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows code changes; it contains no evidence of a rebuild/deploy or anything that demonstrates a successful publish without the draft-expired error.
evidence: <file-diff> (no CI/deploy artifacts or publish output included)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the backend emergency ownership reset authorization code is set to "73024141" and that emergencyResetOwnership only succeeds when the provided authorizationKey exactly equals "73024141"; otherwise it must trap with an unauthorized/invalid reset code error.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated and does not include the emergencyResetOwnership implementation or any explicit check for the exact code "73024141", so the exact-match enforcement and trap message cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a top-level React error boundary UI (AppErrorBoundary) and wrapped the app with it.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-2/REQ-3/REQ-4; this is an additional resilience feature beyond the emergency reset and publish requirements.
